Package index

All functions

clean_data()
Clean and standardize coded qualitative excerpts
coccur()
Plot Code Co-occurrence Heatmap
compare_saturation()
Compare Code Saturation Across Threshold Sets
create_code_summary()
Create a Code Frequency Summary and Optional Plot
create_cooccur_matrix()
Create a Co-occurrence Matrix Table of Codes
map_cooccur_matrix()
Plot a Code Co-occurrence Network
merge_codes()
Merge logical code variables and optionally relabel them
plot_compare_saturation()
Plot saturation comparison across threshold sets
set_saturation()
Compute and Visualize Code Saturation
view_excerpts()
View Qualitative Excerpts by Code
wordcloud()
Generate a word cloud for excerpts by code
